desc: Vintage rugs imported direct from Turkey. These are true antique treasures that you will want to show off in your home for years to come!

layout.text:
Our rugs have history and life worn right into them. Every wool fiber was hand woven and dyed 50-70 years ago. They will add warmth, dimension and character to your home!

We ship Nationwide!

*See our rugs on Fixer to Fabulous
Tuesdays on HGTV!*
